item.title: 2020-05-13-little-golden-cat
item.description: 2020-05-13-little-golden-cat title: “Little Golden Cat” date: “2020-05-13” layout: “posts” tags: blog pandemic Mae slides by and I sense the displaced air, a noticeable shift in housebound stillness.

item.title: 20222-06-01-Avis de Tempete
item.description: Ce que j’explore c’est l’aventure d’habiter un corps humain, les possibilités que recèlent ces limbes, la fraction de seconde entre l’expire l’inspire.

item.title: Tuesday July 18, 2023
item.description: Write 750 words: The body responds to vibration. It also is vibration. The soul is vibration at another frequency. The energetic bodies are vibratory.

item.title: 2024-05-05-Why I Write
item.description: The last 5 years, the only writers who have really captured my full attention have been those people whose work deals with the biggest questions.

item.title: 2024-05-India May 2024
item.description: May 6 The Mother Is always there The Father Needs to hear your call Just as The earth Always supports your weight And the heavens Descend to your voice I am blessed to touch solitude.
I never thought I’d get here.
Overnight we forget that the ghosts speak in our own voices— If I hear him ask me who I am it is only an illusion His voice my voice there is the difference only in Tone.

Write 750 words: Why I Work//What I do// transcription india publicpersona Message: Remission is possible for everyone Type: Lifestyle coach Philosophy: modern Yang Sheng YANGSHENG MINDBOARD Remission is not a fixed state, it is a practice, a process.
Title: Tags: transcription india Related Notes: 2024-07-09 Write 750 words: Less than that, focus on the key.
Title: Tags: taiji Related Notes: TAIJIQUAN_TCM_GONGFU 06_10 Days of Taijiquan Write 750 words: There’s an exhaustion to contend with, after the first two hours.
